briefTitle: The Effect of Breast Cancer Screening Training
officialTitle: The Effect of Breast Cancer Screening Training Given to Municipal Women on Health Literacy, Breast Cancer Screening Beliefs and Behaviors
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women aged 18 and over,
* Volunteering to participate in the study,
* Working in the municipality for at least 1 month and
* Not having any communication problems

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women who have any communication barrier and
* Do not volunteer to participate in the study will be excluded from the study.
